name: Bruno Mineo
summaryContent: A dedicated and versatile professional with a background in psychology and human resources, now expanding into technology with a focus on ChatGPT development and mobile applications. Proven ability to bridge communication gaps, analyze needs, and create effective solutions in both human-centric and technical fields.

experience.title: ChatGPT Developer
experience.description: Development of prompts on ChatGPT and construction of a mobile application in the psychological counseling sector.

experience.title: Mediator (Bemiddelaar)
experience.description: Expertise in matching job seekers with vacancies, client needs analysis, digital tool deployment, and promoting sustainable work relationships.

experience.title: HR Assistant
experience.description: HR assistant in charge of employee management in a social enterprise.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: Integration of autistic children in extracurricular activities.

experience.title: Night Educator
experience.company: IRSA - Royal Institute for Deaf and Blind
experience.description: Night supervisor in a boarding school for blind and autistic children.

experience.title: Pedagogical Coordinator
experience.description: Pedagogical, theoretical and administrative coordination of a team of teachers.

experience.title: Specialized Education Teacher
experience.description: Pedagogical support for psychotic children in French, mathematics and music.

jobMatch.title: Job Match Analysis
jobMatch.description: Paste a job description below to see how well this resume matches.
jobMatch.simulatedAnalysis:
**Resume Match Analysis for Bruno Mineo:**

**Overall Match:** 85%

**Strengths:**
*   **Psychology & HR Background:** Strong alignment with roles requiring understanding of human behavior, client needs analysis, and relationship building.
*   **Technical Skills:** Experience with ChatGPT development and mobile applications is a significant asset for tech-focused roles.
*   **Languages:** Multilingual capabilities (French, Italian, English, Dutch) are highly valuable for international or customer-facing positions.

**Areas for Development:**
*   While the resume shows a transition into tech, more specific examples of completed projects or technical achievements would strengthen the profile for purely technical roles.
